patthana11.14:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in MN 4.)
patthana11.14:1.1_1: One whose teaching is corrupted by corruptions ...
patthana11.14:1.1_2: One whose teaching is not corrupted by oneself, nor by another.
patthana11.14:2.1_2: at the same time which one results of deeds ...
patthana11.14:2.1_3: is ignorant of the Holy One.
